channel.title: Epic Embargos
channel.description:
We are two close friends just expressing our emotions, sharing sexual and dating experiences as bachelors in NYC who consistently lead adventurous lives! Laugh, cry, be disgusted, and shocked as we host weekly podcasts providing a glimpse into our lives. Enjoy!
FOLLOW US ON TWITTER!
ALPHA- http://www.twitter.com/alphaepic
OMEGA- http://www.twitter.com/omegaepic
channel.itunes:subtitle: Always experiencing! LIVING LIFE!
channel.itunes:author: ALPHA & OMEGA

item.title: Episode 1 - Welcome to Epic Embargos
item.description: A little history on us (Alpha and Omega) and what we're all about. Topics include drinking, partying, and getting your ass licked! ENJOY!
